name: Ichimoku Cloud Signal Analysis
question: Which stocks are showing bullish Ichimoku cloud breakout signals?
retailQuestion: Which stocks are breaking into bullish territory?
description: Analyzes Ichimoku cloud formations to identify stocks breaking above the cloud (kumo) with bullish momentum signals. Evaluates Tenkan-sen/Kijun-sen crossovers, cloud color changes, and price position relative to all Ichimoku components for comprehensive trend and momentum analysis.
